atk-s0515a0:5: Bhāventaṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ, phusi yo amataṁ padaṁ.
atk-s0515a0:11: Saṁkhittena hi yo vuttaṁ, dhammacakkaṁ vibhāgaso.
atk-s0515a0:21: Avokkamento samayaṁ sakañca, anāmasanto samayaṁ parañca;
atk-s0515a0:24: Atthaṁ apubbaṁ anuvaṇṇayanto, suttañca yuttiñca anukkamento.
atk-s0515a0:28: Sakkacca saddhammapajotikaṁ taṁ, suṇātha dhāretha ca sādhu santoti.
atk-s0515a0:29_0: Tattha “pāṭho visiṭṭho niddeso, taṁnāmavisesito cā”ti vuttattā duvidho pāṭho – byañjanapāṭho,
atk-s0515a0:29_3: Tattha tīsu dvāresu parisuddhapayogabhāvena visuddhakaruṇānaṁ cittena pavattitadesanā
atk-s0515a0:29_4: vācāhi akathitattā adesitattā akkharamiti saññitā, taṁ pārāyanikabrāhmaṇānaṁ manasā
atk-s0515a0:29_5: pucchitapañhānaṁ vasena bhagavatā ratanaghare nisīditvā sammasitapaṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇavasena
atk-s0515a0:30_0: Atha vā aparipuṇṇaṁ padaṁ akkharamiti gahetabbaṁ “saṭṭhivassasahassānī”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0515a0:30_1: viya. Ettha hi sakāra nakāra sokārādīni akkharamiti, ekakkharaṁ vā padaṁ akkharamiti
atk-s0515a0:30_2: eke. “Yāyaṁ taṇhā ponobhavikā”ti evamādīsu vibhatyantaṁ atthajotakaṁ akkharapiṇḍaṁ
atk-s0515a0:30_3: padaṁ. “Nāmañca rūpañcā”ti evamādīsu bahuakkharehi yuttaṁ padaṁ nāma. Saṁkhittena
atk-s0515a0:30_4: vuttaṁ padaṁ vibhāveti. Padena abhihitaṁ byañjayati byattaṁ pākaṭaṁ karotīti byañjanaṁ,
atk-s0515a0:30_5: vākyameva. “Cattāro iddhipādā”ti saṅkhepena kathitamatthaṁ. “Katame cattāro? Idha,
atk-s0515a0:30_7: iddhipādaṁ bhāvetī”tiādīsu pākaṭakaraṇabhāvena byañjanaṁ nāma. Byañjanavibhāgapakāso
atk-s0515a0:30_8: ākāro. “Tattha katamo chando? Yo chando chandikatā kattukamyatā”ti evamādīsu kathitabyañjanaṁ
atk-s0515a0:30_9: anekavidhena vibhāgakaraṇaṁ ākāro nāma. Ākārābhihitassa nibbacanaṁ nirutti. “Phasso,
atk-s0515a0:30_10: vedanā”ti evamādīsu ākārena kathitaṁ “phusatīti phasso. Vediyatīti vedanā”ti nīharitvā
atk-s0515a0:30_11: vacanaṁ nirutti nāma. Nibbacanavitthāro nissesato desoti niddeso, vediyatīti vedanāti
atk-s0515a0:30_12: nibbacanaladdhapadaṁ “sukhā dukkhā adukkhamasukhā, sukhayatīti sukhā, dukkhayatīti
atk-s0515a0:30_13: dukkhā, neva dukkhayati na sukhayatīti adukkhamasukhā”ti atthavitthāro niravasesena
atk-s0515a0:31_0: Evaṁ chabbidhāni byañjanapadāni jānitvā ca chasu atthapadesu saṅkhepato kāsanā dīpanā
atk-s0515a0:31_1: saṅkāsanā, “maññamāno kho, bhikkhu, bandho mārassa amaññamāno mutto pāpimato”ti evamādīsu
atk-s0515a0:31_2: saṅkhepena atthadīpanā saṅkāsanā nāma. Eso pana thero “buddhena bhagavatā evaṁ saṅkhepaṁ
atk-s0515a0:31_3: katvā vuttamatthaṁ ‘aññātaṁ bhagavā, aññātaṁ sugatā”’ti kathetuṁ samattho paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0515a0:32_0: Upari vattabbamatthaṁ ādito kāsanā dīpanā pakāsanā, “sabbaṁ, bhikkhave, āditta”nti
atk-s0515a0:32_1: evamādīsu pacchā kathitabbamatthaṁ paṭhamavacanena dīpanā pakāsanā nāma. Evaṁ paṭhamaṁ
atk-s0515a0:32_2: dīpitaṁ atthaṁ puna pākaṭaṁ katvā dīpanena “kiñca, bhikkhave, sabbaṁ ādittaṁ? Cakkhuṁ,
atk-s0515a0:32_3: bhikkhave, ādittaṁ, rūpā ādittā”ti evamādīsu kathitesu “tikkhindriyo saṅkhepena vuttaṁ
atk-s0515a0:32_4: paṭivijjhatī”ti kathitattā dve atthapadāni tikkhindriyassa upakāravasena vuttāni.
atk-s0515a0:33_0: Saṁkhittassa vitthārābhidhānaṁ sakiṁ vuttassa ca punapi abhidhānaṁ vivaraṇaṁ, “kusalā
atk-s0515a0:33_1: dhammā”ti saṅkhepena nikkhittassa. “Katame dhammā kusalā? Yasmiṁ samaye kāmāvacaraṁ
atk-s0515a0:33_2: kusalaṁ cittaṁ uppannaṁ hotī”ti niddesavasena vitthāraṇaṁ vitthāravasena puna kathanaṁ vivaraṇaṁ nāma.
atk-s0515a0:34_0: Taṁ vibhāgakaraṇaṁ vibhajanaṁ, “yasmiṁ samaye”ti vivarite kusale dhamme “tasmiṁ samaye
atk-s0515a0:34_1: phasso hoti, vedanā hotī”ti vibhāgakaraṇaṁ vibhajanaṁ nāma. Vivarassa vitthārābhidhānena
atk-s0515a0:34_2: vibhattassa ca upamābhidhānena paṭipādanaṁ uttānīkaraṇaṁ, vivaraṇena vivaritatthassa
atk-s0515a0:34_3: “katamo tasmiṁ samaye phasso hoti? Yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā”ti
atk-s0515a0:34_4: ativivaritvā kathanañca vibhajanena vibhattassa “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gāvī niccammā,
atk-s0515a0:34_5: evameva khvāhaṁ, bhikkhave, phassāhāro daṭṭhabboti vadāmī”ti evamādiupamākathanañca
atk-s0515a0:34_6: uttānīkaraṇaṁ nāma. Dhammaṁ suṇantānaṁ dhammadesanena cittassa anekavidhena somanassauppādanañca
atk-s0515a0:34_7: atikhiṇabuddhīnaṁ anekavidhena ñāṇassa tikhiṇabhāvakaraṇañca paññatti nāma, tesaṁ
atk-s0515a0:34_8: suṇantānaṁ taṁcittatosanena taṁcittanisāmanena ca paññāyatīti paññatti. Tattha bhagavā
atk-s0515a0:34_9: akkharehi saṅkāsayati, padehi pakāsayati, byañjanehi vivarati, ākārehi vibhajati,
atk-s0515a0:34_10: niruttīhi uttānīkaroti, niddesehi paññāpayatīti. Kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti? Buddhā bhagavanto
atk-s0515a0:34_11: ekacce veneyye ekasmiṁ desane akkharehi atthasaṅkāsanaṁ karonti…pe… niddesehi atthapaññāpanaṁ
atk-s0515a0:35_0: Atha vā akkharehi saṅkāsayitvā padehi pakāsayati, byañjanehi vivaritvā ākārehi vibhajati,
atk-s0515a0:35_1: niruttīhi uttānīkatvā niddesehi paññāpayati. Kiṁ vuttaṁ hoti? Evarūpena dhammadesanena
atk-s0515a0:36_0: Atha vā akkharehi ugghāṭayitvā padehi pakāsento vinayati ugghaṭitaññuṁ, byañjanehi
atk-s0515a0:36_1: vivaritvā ākārehi vibhajanto vinayati vipañcitaññuṁ, niruttīhi uttānīkatvā niddesehi
atk-s0515a0:36_2: paññāpento vinayati neyyaṁ. Iti veneyyavasenapi yojetabbameva.
atk-s0515a0:37_0: Atthato panettha katamo byañjanapāṭho, katamo atthapāṭhoti? Buddhānaṁ bhagavantānaṁ
atk-s0515a0:37_1: dhammaṁ desentānaṁ yo atthāvagamako saviññattikasaddo, so byañjanapāṭho. Yo tena
atk-s0515a0:37_2: abhisametabbo lakkhaṇarasādisahito dhammo, so atthapāṭhoti veditabbo. Punapi sandhāyabhāsito
atk-s0515a0:37_3: byañjanabhāsito sāvasesapāṭho anavasesapāṭho nīto neyyoti chabbidho pāṭho. Tattha
atk-s0515a0:37_4: anekatthavattā sandhāyabhāsito “mātaraṁ pitaraṁ hantvā, rājāno dve ca khattiye”ti
atk-s0515a0:37_5: evamādi. Ekatthavattā byañjanabhāsito ‘manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”ti evamādi. Sāvaseso
atk-s0515a0:37_6: “sabbaṁ, bhikkhave, āditta”nti evamādi. Viparīto anavaseso “sabbe dhammā sabbākārena
atk-s0515a0:37_7: buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṁ āgacchantī”ti evamādi. Yathā vacanaṁ, tathā
atk-s0515a0:37_8: avagantabbo nīto “aniccaṁ dukkhaṁ anattā”ti evamādi. Yuttiyā anussaritabbo neyyo
atk-s0515a0:38_0: Attho pana anekappakāro pāṭhattho sabhāvattho ñāyattho pāṭhānurūpo napāṭhānurūpo
atk-s0515a0:38_1: sāvasesattho niravasesattho nītattho neyyattho iccādi. Tattha yo appassatthassa ñāpanatthamuccāriyate,
atk-s0515a0:38_2: so pāṭhattho “sātthaṁ sabyañjana”ntiādīsu viya. Rūpārūpadhammānaṁ lakkhaṇarasādisabhāvattho
atk-s0515a0:38_3: “sammādiṭṭhiṁ bhāvetī”tiādīsu viya. Yo ñāyamāno hitāya saṁvattati, so ñātuṁ arahatīti
atk-s0515a0:38_4: ñāyattho – “atthavādī dhammavādī”tiādīsu viya. Yathāpāṭhaṁ bhāsito pāṭhānurūpo “cakkhu,
atk-s0515a0:38_5: bhikkhave, purāṇakamma”nti bhagavatā vuttaṁ. Tasmā cakkhumapi kammanti. Byañjanacchāyāya
atk-s0515a0:38_6: atthaṁ paṭibāhayamānena vutto attho napāṭhānurūpo, so pāṭhato ananuññāto akatapaṭikkhepo
atk-s0515a0:38_7: viyutto. So ca saṅgahetabbampi asaṅgahetvā, parivajjetabbampi vā kiñci aparivajjetvā
atk-s0515a0:38_8: parisesaṁ katvā vutto sāvasesattho “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ.
atk-s0515a0:38_9: Sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno”tiādīsu viya. Viparīto niravasesattho
atk-s0515a0:38_10: “sandhāvitaṁ saṁsaritaṁ mamañceva tumhākañca. Tatra, bhikkhave, ko mantā ko saddhātā…pe…
atk-s0515a0:38_11: aññatra diṭṭhapadehī”tiādīsu viya. Saddavaseneva veditabbo nītattho “rūpā saddā rasā
atk-s0515a0:38_12: gandhā, phoṭṭhabbā ca manoramā”tiādīsu viya. Sammutivasena veditabbo neyyattho “cattārome,
atk-s0515a0:38_13: bhikkhave, valāhakūpamā puggalā”tiādīsu viya. Evamidha pāṭhañca atthañca vivaritvā
atk-s0515a0:38_14: ṭhito asaṁhīro bhavati paravādīhi dīgharattaṁ titthavāsena.
atk-s0515a0:39_0: Iti asaṁhīrabhāvena yāva āgamādhigamasampadaṁ, tāva vattuṁ sakkoti. Saṅkhepavitthāranayena
atk-s0515a0:39_1: hetudāharaṇādīhi avabodhayituṁ samattho. Evaṁvidho attānañca parañca sodhetuṁ samatthabhāvena
atk-s0515a0:39_2: dussīlyadiṭṭhimalavirahitattā suci. Dussīlo hi attānaṁ upahanati, tena nādeyyavāco
atk-s0515a0:39_3: ca bhavati sabyohāramāno idha niccāturo vejjova. Duddiṭṭhi paraṁ upahanati, nāvassayo
atk-s0515a0:39_4: ca bhavati vāḷagahākulo iva kamalasaṇḍo. Ubhayavipanno pana sabbathāpi anupāsanīyo
atk-s0515a0:39_5: bhavati gūthagatamiva chavālātaṁ gūthagato viya ca kaṇhasappo. Ubhayasampanno pana
atk-s0515a0:39_6: sabbathāpi upāsanīyo sevitabbo ca viññūhi, nirupaddavo iva ratanākaro, evaṁ bhūto
atk-s0515a0:42: Etesaṁ vā apariccāgī. Tato eva sotūnaṁ hite niyuttattā nesaṁ avabodhanaṁ pati akilāsu bhavatīti. Āha cettha –
atk-s0515a0:45_0: Ettha desakassāti desako assa, bhaveyyāti attho. Hitānvitoti hite anugato hitacitto.
atk-s0515a0:45_1: So eso sucittā piyo, catunnaṁ apariccāgittā garu, asaṁhīrattā bhāvanīyo, desakattā
atk-s0515a0:45_2: vattā, hitānvitattā vacanakkhamo, pāṭhatthavidattā gambhīrakathaṁ kattā, amaccharattā
atk-s0515a0:47: Gambhīrañca kathaṁ kattā, no cāṭṭhāne niyojako”ti. ;
atk-s0515a0:49_0: Tattha dhammagaruttā kathaṁ na paribhavati, ācariyagaruttā kathikaṁ na paribhavati,
atk-s0515a0:49_1: saddhāpaññādiguṇapaṭimaṇḍitattā attānaṁ na paribhavati, asaṭhāmāyāvittā amatābhimukhattā
atk-s0515a0:49_2: ca avikkhittacitto bhavati, sumedhattā yoniso manasi karotīti. Vuttañhetaṁ –
atk-s0515a0:50_0: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṁ bhabbo niyāmaṁ okkamituṁ
atk-s0515a0:50_1: kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṁ. Katamehi pañcahi? Na kathaṁ paribhoti, na kathikaṁ paribhoti,
atk-s0515a0:50_2: na attānaṁ paribhoti, avikkhittacitto dhammaṁ suṇāti ekaggacitto, yoniso manasi karotī”ti.
atk-s0515a0:55: Evaṁ vuttappakāraṁ byañjanañca atthañca dassetvā idāni yo atiaggaṁ katvā kathitattā mahāsamuddamahāpathavī viya mahā ca so niddeso cāti mahāniddeso, taṁ mahāniddesaṁ vaṇṇayissāmi.
atk-s0515a0:56_0: Tadetaṁ mahāniddesaṁ atthasampannaṁ byañjanasampannaṁ gambhīraṁ gambhīratthaṁ lokuttarappakāsakaṁ
atk-s0515a0:56_8: lokānukampakena satthukappena dhammarājassa dhammasenāpatinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena
atk-s0515a0:56_9: bhāsitaṁ sutvā āyasmā ānando paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle yathāsutameva saṅgahaṁ āropesi.
atk-s0515a0:57_0: So panesa vinayapiṭakaṁ suttantapiṭakaṁ abhidhammapiṭakanti tīsu piṭakesu suttantapiṭakapariyāpanno,
atk-s0515a0:57_1: dīghanikāyo majjhimanikāyo saṁyuttanikāyo aṅguttaranikāyo khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu
atk-s0515a0:57_2: mahānikāyesu khuddakamahānikāyapariyāpanno, suttaṁ geyyaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ gāthā udānaṁ
atk-s0515a0:57_3: itivuttakaṁ jātakaṁ abbhutadhammaṁ vedallanti navasu satthusāsanaṅgesu yathāsambhavaṁ
atk-s0515a0:59: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. –
atk-s0515a0:60_0: Dhammabhaṇḍāgārikattherena pañcasu ṭhānesu etadaggaṁ āropitena paṭiññātānaṁ caturāsītiyā
atk-s0515a0:60_1: dhammakkhandhasahassānaṁ bhikkhuto gahitesu dvīsu dhammakkhandhasahassesu anekasatadhammakkhandhasaṅgahito.
atk-s0515a0:60_2: Tassa dve vaggā aṭṭhakavaggo pārāyanavaggo khaggavisāṇasuttañca, ekekasmiṁ vagge
atk-s0515a0:60_3: soḷasa soḷasa katvā khaggavisāṇasuttañcāti tettiṁsa suttāni kāmasuttādikhaggavisāṇasuttapariyosānāni.
atk-s0515a0:60_4: Evaṁ anekadhā vavatthāpitassa imassa mahāniddesassa anupubbapadatthavaṇṇanaṁ karissāmi.
atk-s0515a0:60_5: Ayañhi mahāniddeso pāṭhato atthato ca uddisantena niddisantena ca sakkaccaṁ uddisitabbo
atk-s0515a0:60_6: niddisitabbo ca, uggaṇhantenāpi sakkaccaṁ uggaṇhitabbo dhāretabbo ca. Taṁ kissa hetu?
atk-s0515a0:60_7: Gambhīrattā imassa mahāniddesassa lokahitāya loke ciraṭṭhitatthanti.
